com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework

Class SmartAdapters.BasicBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass extends android.app.Activity,ViewAttributesType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework.SmartAdapters.BasicBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass,ViewAttributesType>
  • Type Parameters:
    BusinessObjectClass - the business object class which is represented by the current wrapper
    ActivityClass - the Activity class which will host the current wrapper graphical representation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SmartAdapters.BasisBusinessViewWrapper
    Enclosing class:
    SmartAdapters

    protected abstract static class SmartAdapters.BasicBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass extends android.app.Activity,ViewAttributesType>
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps a business object and its underlying Android View in a list or a grid, or whatever kind of Adapter.
    Since:
    2014.05.23

      • createNewView

        protected abstract android.view.View createNewView(ActivityClass activity,
                              android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                              BusinessObjectClass businessObjectClass)
        Is responsible for creating a new View, which is able to represent the provided business object.
        Parameters:
        activity - the Activity which hosts the view
        parent - the parent view, as provided by the Adapter.getView(int, View, ViewGroup) method
        businessObjectClass - the business object the returned view will represent graphically
        Returns:
        a new view, which will be used by the underlying Adapter

      • getViewAttributes

        public final ViewAttributesType getViewAttributes(android.view.View view)

        Returns:
